main event: An object struck the surface of the earth and bounced, appearing as a ball of red and orange flame with a long orange streamer of fire.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 16 seconds., The object was classified as a probable meteor in the report., It was recorded by an aircraft 9 miles from Cape St. George., No correlation was found between the sighting and any known aircraft in the area., A search was conducted for one and a half hours with negative results.
sighted object: a ball of red and orange flame with a long orange streamer of fire
witness description: unknown, as the names, ages, and addresses of witnesses were not provided
